long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manually writing email signatures involves undergoing a series of irritating, labor intensive steps like pressing buttons on your keyboard. With this extension, you can greatly cut down on the amount of work required with just a simple click of a button, and then a random email signature is generated and pasted into your inbox for you!

Additionally, this extension comes pre-loaded with a handful of experimental email signatures ready for use, taken from this Twitter thread: https://twitter.com/NateMJensen/status/1575231032357715968. But if desired, users can save and use their custom signatures.

Note: This extension is primarily designed for Gmail. Performance may vary on other email platforms.
